title: Bug 4329 No results If searched via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: Bug 4329 No results If searched via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
OB: When searching for declarations in the Package view selection and dialog, the Search dialog initializes with the fully qualified name. However, no results are found when searching for declarations. It is important to note that searching via the context menu in the packages view works correctly.
EB: The search functionality in the Package view selection and dialog should try to get the Java element first. If the search fails, the system should display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Package view selection and dialog. 
2. Enter a search query for declarations. 
3. Observe that no results are displayed. 

To verify the correct behavior: 
1. Open the Package view selection and dialog. 
2. Enter a search query for declarations. 
3. Observe that the search returns the appropriate results based on the query.
